ingredients: 1 quart strawberries, hulled, 2  fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and sliced, 1  banana, broken into chunks, 2 cups ice, 1 cup orange-peach-mango juice
nutrition: Total Fat 1g 1%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 16mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 29g 10%, Dietary Fiber 4g 14%, Total Sugars 20g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 129mg 644%, Calcium 36mg 3%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 443mg 9%
